title: A Brief History of Time
author: Stephen Hawking
description: Explores the nature of time and the universe.

title: The Elegant Universe
author: Brian Greene
description: Examines string theory and the quest for a unified theory.

title: Cosmos
author: Carl Sagan
description: A journey through space, time, and the universe.

title: Astrophysics for People in a Hurry
author: Neil deGrasse Tyson
description: A quick and accessible overview of astrophysics.

title: The Universe in a Nutshell
author: Stephen Hawking
description: A deeper look into the concepts from A Brief History of Time.

title: Parallel Worlds
author: Michio Kaku
description: Discusses the multiverse and alternate realities.

title: The Grand Design
author: Stephen Hawking
description: Explores the laws of the universe and why it exists.

title: Black Holes and Baby Universes
author: Stephen Hawking
description: Essays on black holes, cosmology, and Hawking's personal reflections.

title: The Fabric of the Cosmos
author: Brian Greene
description: Explores space, time, and the nature of reality.

title: Just Six Numbers
author: Martin Rees
description: The six numbers that define the structure of the universe.

title: Why Does E=mc²?
author: Brian Cox and Jeff Forshaw
description: An accessible explanation of Einstein’s famous equation.

title: The Order of Time
author: Carlo Rovelli
description: A philosophical and scientific look at the nature of time.

title: Seven Brief Lessons on Physics
author: Carlo Rovelli
description: A concise guide to modern physics and the cosmos.

title: The Hidden Reality
author: Brian Greene
description: Explores different types of parallel universes.

title: Physics of the Impossible
author: Michio Kaku
description: Analyzes the science behind science fiction concepts.

title: Until the End of Time
author: Brian Greene
description: Explores the cosmic story from the Big Bang to the end of time.

title: The Beginning of Infinity
author: David Deutsch
description: Explores the reach of scientific explanations and knowledge.

title: Time Reborn
author: Lee Smolin
description: Challenges current ideas about time and proposes new theories.

title: The First Three Minutes
author: Steven Weinberg
description: Describes the first three minutes after the Big Bang.

title: The Black Hole War
author: Leonard Susskind
description: A debate over the nature of black holes and information loss.
